/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on income from a mortgage or contract for deed, including
general principles of income from a mortgage or contract for deed
applying the general principles of income from a mortgage or contract for deed
countable income in a contract for deed or mortgage
, and
countable interest versus non-countable principal
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
